item.title: Wallpaper Automation Tool: WPCTL
item.description: Hey, Today I will come up with a very minimalistic wallpaper automation tool WPCTL. I spend most of my time on the computer. There are not too many options to have fun with while working on the computer. Interesting and colorful photos are one of the favorite entertainment sources for my daily routine. Therefore, I really like auto wallpaper changer programs which surprises me with different photos. I decided to use one of these programs.
